title: Why cant we buy more rune pages?
body: I think riot took out the ability to buy rune pages because i cant find it anymore. I think that rune pages are important and that we need them back.

replies.body: It's hidden.  select "all" instead of "tier 3" and it should show up.^^
God thank you so much lmao
Oh my, you've been without an extra page for 18 days O.O

http://imgur.com/XfJRmy5

make your store look like that
